title: Victoria Beckham recreates iconic leg pose in the middle of a restaurant
text:

Victoria Beckham has once again showed off how flexible she is as she recreates her now legendary leg pose.

The fashion designer, 45, is known for taking hilarious photos performing tasks in public with her leg sticking up in the air.

The latest location is a packed restaurant in New York, where a carefree Posh Spice is staying true to her Brit roots and drinking a cup of tea.

(Image: Victoria Beckham/Instagram)

(Image: Victoria Beckham/Instagram)

Lounging on the seat, she kicks her leg up in the air with ease, with the Boomerang feature hilariously making it look as though she is doing it multiple times.

Alongside it she wrote: "Leaving NYC."

She joked: "Feeling good about my Rockettes audition, fingers crossed!"

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Internet Unknown)

The Rockettes are an American precision dance company known for their high kick lines in complete synchronisation.

Victoria added several dancing girl emojis to the light-hearted post.

She shocked viewers on a US chat show when she joked about her sex life with husband of 20 years, David.

(Image: The View)

(Image: The View)

During a chat on The View, the 45-year-old also described David as "wonderful" and how lucky she was to have him as her soulmate.

Asking Victoria about the success of their marriage the show's host Joy Behar said: "You have to be friends with somebody after many years together, because the sex, eh..."

To which Victoria giggled: "Don't worry about that!"

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images for Hug)

Victoria wrote a letter to her 18-year-old self back for Vogue last year, offering marriage tips.

She said: "In marriage: have patience. Bite your tongue. Be supportive. And preserve a bit of mystique.

"Never let yourself go completely (at least brush your hair, clean your teeth, have a bit of a brow going on because you will always want him to look at you and feel attracted)."

David said previously that the secret to keeping their relationship alive was having a dedicated date night every Wednesday.
description: Victoria Beckham has once again made fans giggle with her strange pose that has now become iconic
